    • Method Detail

      • defaultScope

        static Scope defaultScope()

      • of

      • of

        static Scope of​(Configuration configuration)

      • settings

        Settings settings()
        Gets the current settings of this scope.

        The scope is initialized with its settings upon creation and will read them from a config file. The settings can be modified by any service during the lifetime of the scope.

        Returns:
        the current scope settings

      • configuration

        Configuration configuration()
        The current configuration of this scope.

        The configuration is never null but may change during the lifetime of the scope. Directly access the configuration from the scope when you need it and do not cache it in a variable.

        The configuration may change when the scope is being bootstrapped, but should stay the same after bootstrapping has finished.

        Returns:
        the current configuration of this scope

      • get

        <TProvider extends Provider> TProvider get​(java.lang.Class<TProvider> providerClass)
        Tries to find a provider for the registered provider class and returns its instance.

        The lifetime of the underlying provider is handled by the module that registered it.

        Type Parameters:
        TProvider - the type of the provider
        Parameters:
        providerClass - the class of the provider that should be retrieved
        Returns:
        the provider if it is registered else null

      • store

        default StorageProvider store()
        Gets the storage provider of this scope.

        Use the StorageProvider to store persistent data for your module or targets.

        This is just a shortcut to {@link #configuration()#store()}.

        Returns:
        the storage provider
        See Also:
        StorageProvider

      • register

        default ArtProvider register()
        Use the ArtProvider to register your art objects, like actions, requirements and trigger.
        Returns:
        the art provider to register art objects

      • load

        ArtContext load​(java.lang.String key,
                java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> list)
         throws ParseException
        Loads the given string list and tries to parse each line into a valid art object.

        Uses the provided storage key to store the data of the context and reference it in future uses. Make sure to pass in the same storage key for all loads that need to persist data across sessions.

        Use the resulting ArtContext to ArtContext.execute(Object...), ArtContext.test(Object) or listen ArtContext.onTrigger(Class, TriggerListener).

        Parameters:
        key - the unique storage key for this provided input
        list - the list of valid art that is parsed into an art context
        Returns:
        the parsed art context
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the parse operation of the input fails
        See Also:
        load(String, Collection)

      • load

        ArtContext load​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> list)
         throws ParseException
        Loads the given string list and tries to parse each line into a valid art object.

        Use the resulting ArtContext to ArtContext.execute(Object...), ArtContext.test(Object) or listen ArtContext.onTrigger(Class, TriggerListener).

        Parameters:
        list - the list of valid art that is parsed into an art context
        Returns:
        the parsed art context
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • trigger

        default <TTrigger extends Trigger> TriggerExecution<TTrigger> trigger​(java.lang.Class<TTrigger> triggerClass)
        Starts a new trigger execution for the given trigger class.

        Use the returned execution builder to add targets and additional config parameters to the trigger execution. Whe done call TriggerExecution.execute().

        Type Parameters:
        TTrigger - the type of the trigger
        Parameters:
        triggerClass - the class of the trigger
        Returns:
        a new trigger execution builder
